title: Desi Lydic | Trump Calls Into Fox, Calls Russia Probe a “Coup”: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at President Trump’s standoff with Congress as some Democrats call for his impeachment.

Then, Desi Lydic talks about how other countries view gender equality in the US, Namibia’s progress toward gender equality and her aunt’s dirty wedding gift. She also sticks around for a few more questions backstage at Studio 8G exclusively for this podcast.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
